about.title: About GXTRONIC
about.subtitle: Leaders in innovation and LED driver manufacturing
about.missionText: To develop and manufacture high-quality LED drivers that enable our customers to create efficient, durable and sustainable lighting solutions for a better future.
about.ourValuesDesc: The principles that guide our daily work
about.ledFutureDesc: We continue to innovate to offer the best LED driver solutions, incorporating emerging technologies such as IoT, intelligent control and advanced monitoring systems.
about.historyText: GXTRONIC was born in 2013 with the vision of revolutionizing the LED lighting sector through high-efficiency and superior quality drivers. Since our beginnings, we have specialized in developing power electronics solutions that maximize the performance of LED lighting systems.
about.historyText2: With more than a decade of experience, we have established ourselves as a leading company in the European market, offering innovative products that meet the highest international standards of quality and energy efficiency.
about.historyText3: Our commitment to excellence has led us to establish lasting relationships with customers throughout Europe, from small businesses to large industrial corporations.
